revised_title: Ritualization of Behaviour in Animals and Man: Social and Communal Display
tldr: This article discusses the ritualization of behavior in animals and humans, specifically focusing on social and communal displays in birds. The author explores the evolution of these displays, their functions, and how they contribute to communication, reproduction, and survival. The article also highlights the importance of ecological background and general mode of life in shaping these displays.
